Body:
BC-CENTRAL-FLORIDA-PARKSLIST-HNS 
WHEN YOU GO: THEME PARKS 


  
 (For use by New York Times News Service clients)  c.1999 Houston Chronicle 
 

   _ Busch Gardens, Tampa, Fla. Admission: $44 ($35 for children).
Information: 800-372-1797. Web: www.buschgardens.com.

   _ Busch Gardens Williamsburg, Williamsburg, Va. Admission: $35
($28 for children). Information: 757-253-3350. Web:
www.buschgardens.com.

   _ Cedar Point, Sandusky, Ohio. Admission: $32.95 ($27.95 for
children). Information: 419-627-2350. Web: www.cedarpoint.com.

   _ Walt Disney World Resort _ Disney's Animal Kingdom, Magic
Kingdom, Epcot, Disney-MGM Studios; Buena Vista, Fla. Single-day,
single-park admission: $44 ($35 for children). Information:
407-824-4321. Web: www.disneyworld.com.

   _ Gatorland, Orlando, Fla. Admission: $17.95 ($7.93 for
children). Information: 800-393-5297. Web: www.gatorland.com.

   _ Paramount's Carowinds, Charlotte, N.C. Admission: $31.99
($19.99 for children). Information: 800-888-4386. Web:
www.carowinds.com.

   _ Paramount's Great America in Santa Clara, Calif. Admission:
$32.99 ($19.50 for children). Information: 408-988-1776. Web:
www.pgathrills.com.

   _ Paramount's Kings Dominion, Richmond, Va. Admission: $33.99
($24.99 for children). Information: 804-876-5000. Web:
www.pkd4fun.com.

   _ Paramount's Kings Island, Cincinnati, Ohio. Admission: $34.99
($19.99 for children). Information: 800-288-0808. Web: www.pki.com.

   _ Kennywood, West Mifflin, Pa. Admission: $21.95. Information:
412-461-0500. Web: www.kennywood.com.

   _ Legoland, Carlsbad, Calif. Admission: $32 ($25 for children).
Information: 760-918-5346. Web: www.legoland.com.

   _ Sea World of Florida, Orlando, Fla. Admission: $44 ($35 for
children). Information: 800-327-2424. Web: www.seaworld.com.

   _ Sea World of Texas, San Antonio, Texas. Admission: $31.95
($21.95 for children). Information: 210-523-3611. Web:
www.seaworld.com.

   _ Silver Dollar City, Branson, Mo. Admission: $31.20 ($20.50 for
children). Information: 417-336-7100. Web:
www.silverdollarcity.com.

   _ Six Flags AstroWorld, Houston. Admission: $32.99 ($16.50 for
children shorter than 48 inches). Information: 713-799-1234. Web:
www.sixflags.com.

   _ WaterWorld, Houston. Admission: $16.99 ($12.99 for children).
Information: 713-799-1234. Web: www.sixflags.com.

   _ Six Flags Fiesta Texas, San Antonio, Texas. Admission: $29.99
($14.99 for children). Information: 210-697-5050. Web:
www.sixflags.com.

   _ Six Flags Great Adventure, Jackson, N.J. Admission: $35.99
(half price for children). Information: 732-928-1821. Web:
www.sixflags.com.

   _ Six Flags Magic Mountain, Valencia, Calif. Admission: $36
($9.99 for children). Information: 805-255-4111. Web:
www.sixflags.com.

   _ Six Flags over Texas, Arlington, Texas. Admission: $34.99
($17.50 for children). Information: 817-640-8900. Web:
www.sixflags.com.

   _ Universal Studios Hollywood, Los Angeles. Admission $39 ($29
for children). Information: 818-622-3801. Web:
www.universalstudios.com.

     
XXXX END OF STORY
